com.clover.sdk.util

Class CloverAccount

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.clover.sdk.util.CloverAccount

  • public class CloverAccount
extends Object
    This class provides access to the Clover Account object on the device.
    See Also:
    Account, AccountManager

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String CLOVER_ACCOUNT_TYPE
      The account type string for Clover accounts.
      static String CLOVER_AUTHTOKEN_TYPE 
      static String KEY_APP_ID 
      static String KEY_BASE_URL 
      static String KEY_FORCE_VALIDATE 
      static String KEY_MERCHANT_ID 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods Deprecated Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Account getAccount(Context context)
      Get the Clover Account on the device.
      static Account[] getAccounts(Context context)
      Deprecated. 
      Use getAccount(Context) instead. Very early versions of Clover software supported multiple Clover Accounts on a single device, but this is no longer the case, there is now always a single Clover Account on each device.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • getAccount

        public static Account getAccount(Context context)
        Get the Clover Account on the device. If there are multiple Clover accounts, only the first is returned. Requires your Android Manifest include android.permission.GET_ACCOUNTS. The Clover Account is needed by most Clover service connectors.
        Parameters:
        context - the context from your Android application or component
        Returns:
        the Clover account on the device, should never return null

      • getAccounts

        @Deprecated
public static Account[] getAccounts(Context context)
        Deprecated. Use getAccount(Context) instead. Very early versions of Clover software supported multiple Clover Accounts on a single device, but this is no longer the case, there is now always a single Clover Account on each device.
